artist: Painter: After Alessandro Tiarini; Delineator: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Antonio Marchi
description: Mary seated, holding the body of Christ outside the tomb; woman at left holding her hand; woman at right praying; man behind holding a turban and gesturing to tomb; man in foreground holding crown of thorns; 3 crosses in right distance
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: A. Tiarini dip.   Fran. Rosaspina del.  Ant Marchi inc. / SEPOLTURA DI GESU CRISTO  | on sheet in pencil: 2-472
title: Sepoltura di Gesu Cristo
